metadata.synopsis: Mino, one of the druids guarding the den, reacts to its successful defence. He also reacts if the tiefling refugees have left and if victory was secured owing to the assassination of the goblin leadership

0.speaker: Mino
0.text: Some normalcy can return to the Grove. At last.

1.speaker: Mino
1.text: I hear the goblins' leaders met their ends. Unfortunate for them, but very fortunate for the Grove.

2.speaker: Mino
2.text: Goblins at our gates. In our home. Silvanus' mercy...
2.context: NodeContext: Reacting to a goblin attack that occurred

3.speaker: Mino
3.text: Those goblins ought never to have found us. They never would have, if we'd been properly secluded.
3.context: NodeContext: Reacting to a goblin attack that occurred

4.speaker: Mino
4.text: The tieflings have gone - good. I wish them well, but they crowded us for far too long.
4.context: NodeContext: Glad to have tieflings gone. Gives an unsubtle hint to tiefling players that perhaps they should leave also.

5.speaker: Mino
5.text: Without leaders, those goblins present little threat to the Grove. Silvanus has blessed us.
